extendedInfo.description: Because someone needs to build a proper transport app!.Our MISSION is to make the complex London transport system simple and usable. We're reinventing the transport app in the real-time world, specifically for Android devices.- The most comprehensive A to B journey planner with live / real-time info on buses, tubes, cycles and rail across London.- Rapid updates. We will keep improving this app until its the best one on your phone.***** Reviews:- "Without a doubt this is my most useful app."- "If I could only have one app on my phone, this would be it."- "Best transport app I have ever used."- "Greatest thing since the invention of transport apps."- "This was the only thing I missed moving to Android (from iPhone)."- "Combines tasks I have several apps for, now I can just keep one."- "I use it every day. They have literally thought of everything."- "The most useful and well developed app on Android."What we do:- A to B journey planning for tubes, buses, rail, cycles and walking, with integrated real-time info for buses and tubes (e.g. "your bus is leaving in 5 mins").- Real-time departure info for buses, tubes, trains as well as live cycle hire info.- Transport resources: Tube Map, Disruptions, etc.- Save your favourites.- Get Me Home button, find out how in one tap.- The simplest designed interface you'll ever use.Coming soon:- LOTS. This app will update often.Please note: the app requires data access and GPS.Questions? Email us at support(at).Keywords: city mapper, City Mapper, underground, tfl, countdown, transit, times, bike, supercalifragilistic.

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: Just a few quick tests have made it clear I am going to use this app a great deal. It is powerful, fluid and intuitive.
reviews.author: Rupert Brun

reviews.title: Excellent app. Just what\'s needed.
reviews.comment: I replaced 3 old apps with this one. All your London transport needs in one place. Brilliant!
reviews.author: Gareth Wilson

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Absolutely fantastic. Not only fast and smooth, but also gives you info about cycles and free docks, which is priceless to me. Thank you for this!
reviews.author: Roman \305\240kr\303\251ta

reviews.title: ...best london travel app ever!!!
reviews.comment: ...have only used it for 5 minutes but this is the best all round app for getting around in london. would like to see offline map to make it even better .az:o)
reviews.author: Azizul Hoque

reviews.title: Better on ios
reviews.comment: I used this app on ios and is much more better.  At least I\'m expecting the same features it has on iPhone. That\'s the reason for 3 stars.  Otherwise it\'s the best transport app for me.
reviews.author: Panos Michailoudis

reviews.title: exactly, what you need
reviews.comment: this app is close to perfection, powerful, but simple to use. great work, guys! i would easily buy it, if it wouldn\'t be free ;)
reviews.author: Saso Filipovic

reviews.title: Great software
reviews.comment: Easy to use, and completely fit for purpose. One of the very best android apps around. Smooth performance and no glitches.
reviews.author: Mike Daniels

reviews.title: The best London travel app
reviews.comment: An essential app for getting round London.
reviews.author: Paul Green

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Quick. Best I\'ve seen
reviews.author: Ed Keohane

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: The best travel app I have ever used!
reviews.author: plamen kostov

reviews.title: All-in-one functionality is great
reviews.comment: -Being able to search for a bus by its number would be useful   -and an actual timetable combined with Live bus times so I know if I miss it, how long I have to wait for the next one.   -And when there\'s two bus stops, one either side of the road, having a label for their direction. (instead of the labels like E or P, Q- what do they mean?)
reviews.author: James Stevens

reviews.title: Minor glitch, but so far the best app
reviews.comment: I was frustrated of using Boris bike official app. It\'s crap and never work.  And I was also puzzled by bus checker I bought a while ago because if I don\'t know the direction of the bus it is useless for me to pick a r oute hoping to get the right one and see bus stops.   A friend of mine suggested citymapper that brilliantly solved both the problems.
reviews.author: Andrea Moro

reviews.title: Must have for all Londoners!
reviews.comment: App updates in real time so when those unforseen incidents happen on your line you can get alternative routes quickly. Having said that,  it doesn\'t give much detail beyond \"your journey may be disrupted\". The app\'s estimated times are fairly accurate. App does not always get destination. I entered a postcode that my Tomtom found but the app couldn\'t.  I\'d suggest also downloading an app with offline London maps for when you\'re in a tunnel and don\'t have signal and you need to plan an alternate route.
reviews.author: Gary Murphy

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Very good user experience.
reviews.author: Irene Papakonstantinou

reviews.title: Awesome app. Life changing!
reviews.comment: I\'m still amazed that this app is free. It\'s really changed the way I travel around London - the daunting bus network is tamed for me!
reviews.author: Neil Monk

reviews.title: Beautifully designed transport hub
reviews.comment: Can\'t think of much I\'d want to change or improve. Clean interface covering trains, tubes, buses and bikes across London. If only I could just travel by rampaging android, my journeys would be compete in no time
reviews.author: Neil Campbell

reviews.title: Better than Google
reviews.comment: Simply the best
reviews.author: Bogdan Ciocoiu

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: great application
reviews.author: Federica Sarro

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Impressive travel app. Really good work. The ability to favourite Barclays bike docks would be great!
reviews.author: Ben T

reviews.title: Unique app
reviews.comment: A real life saver. Beautiful.
reviews.author: Sebastien Krier
